name: GET-Collectionsbyseachterms
description: Retrieves a list of collections matching a filter.

Content-Type.description: Type of the content being sent.

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation _Accept_ Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.

searchTerms.description: String that will search for a collection related to it.

pageSize.description: Number of the items of the page.

orderByAsc.description: Defines if the items of the page are in ascending order.
